Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Controllers

package BobcatLib.Hardware.Controllers
Controls Controller implementations. Supports Ruffy, EightBitDo, Logitech,PS4, PS5, and Xbox
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    BobcatLib.Hardware.Controllers.parser
    Used in the controller config parsing from the deploy folder.
  • Class
    Description
    Axis
    Represents an input axis with deadband and slew rate limiting.
    ControllerWrapper
    Controller Wrapper
    EightBitDo
    Wrapper class for the EightBitDo controller using WPILib's CommandJoystick.
    Logitech
    Wrapper class for the Logitech controller using WPILib's CommandJoystick.
    OI
    The Operator Interface (OI) class manages the controller inputs and button mappings for the robot's driver.
    PS4ControllerWrapper
    A wrapper class for the PS4 controller that extends CommandPS4Controller and implements the ControllerWrapper interface.
    PS5ControllerWrapper
    A wrapper class for the PS5 controller that extends CommandPS5Controller and implements the ControllerWrapper interface.
    Ruffy
    A wrapper class for the Ruffy joystick controller that implements the ControllerWrapper interface.
    XboxControllerWrapper
    A wrapper class for the Xbox controller that implements the ControllerWrapper interface.
